dependencies.description:
cairocffi is a CFFI-based drop-in replacement for Pycairo, a set of
Python bindings and object-oriented API for cairo. Cairo is a 2D vector
graphics library with support for multiple backends including image
buffers, PNG, PostScript, PDF, and SVG file output.
dependencies.name: py-cairocffi

dependencies.description:
cssselect2 is a straightforward implementation of CSS4 Selectors for
markup documents (HTML, XML, etc.) that can be read by ElementTree-like
parsers (including cElementTree, lxml, html5lib, etc.)
dependencies.name: py-cssselect2

dependencies.description: defusing XML bombs and other exploits
dependencies.name: py-defusedxml

dependencies.description:
Pillow is a fork of the Python Imaging Library (PIL). It adds image
processing capabilities to your Python interpreter. This library
supports many file formats, and provides powerful image processing and
graphics capabilities.
dependencies.name: py-pillow

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description:
tinycss2 is a low-level CSS parser and generator written in Python: it
can parse strings, return objects representing tokens and blocks, and
generate CSS strings corresponding to these objects.
dependencies.name: py-tinycss2

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

description:
CairoSVG is an SVG converter based on Cairo. It can export SVG files to
PDF, EPS, PS, and PNG files.
name: py-cairosvg

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
